<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Duergar Sharpshooter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=168)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Duergar sharpshooters serve both as ranged support for slaver parties and as snipers posted on towers overlooking quarries and other areas where enslaved workers toil away the hours. Duergar sharpshooters also specialize in nonlethal methods of ranged combat—tactics they are often called upon to use when quelling slave riots or capturing escaped slaves.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

**Perception** +4; darkvision

**AC** 17

**Will** +4

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
light mace +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +7 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing or bola bolt

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 12
- **2nd**
[Enlarge](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) (self only), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (self only)

**Bola Bolt**   This shot deals no damage, but on a hit, the target must succeed at a DC 16 Reflex save or be knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) and [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) until it is freed with a successful DC 15 check to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79). This check can be attempted either by the target or a creature adjacent to the target.

</column>
